Introduction to Machine Learning

10-601B, Fall 2016
School of Computer Science
Carnegie Mellon University

Course Info

  • Time: Monday and Wednesday, 12:00 PM - 1:20 PM (GHC 4401)
  • Instructors: Nina Balcan and Matt Gormley
  • Instructors Email: 10601-instructors@cs.cmu.edu
  • Piazza Webpage: https://piazza.com/cmu/fall2016/10601b/home
  • Autolab: https://autolab.andrew.cmu.edu/courses/10601b-f16/
  • Gradescope: https://gradescope.com/courses/3908

Announcements

  • If you wish to email only the instructors and TAs, the email is 10601-instructors@cs.cmu.edu. We prefer questions to be posted on Piazza, where you can use a Private Note to contact only the instructors and TAs.
  • Class begins on Monday, August 29th, 2016. See you then!
  • Please let us know if you cannot access Autolab or Piazza.
  • IF YOU ARE ON THE WAITING LIST: If the class is fully subscribed, you may want to consider the following options:
    • Come to the first several lectures and see how the course develops. We will admit as many students from the waitlist as we can, once we see how many registered students drop the course during the first two weeks.
    • Take the class when it is offered again in the Spring semester;
